channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Land and Sea
channel.desc: On Nova Scotia's Eastern Shore, artists draw inspiration from the captivating landscape and create art that mirrors its beauty.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: The Nature of Things
channel.desc: Water provides the largest habitat on Earth, but water-dependent wildlife is declining fast. Learning to share these watery worlds can offer a brighter future for the entire planet.
